name: Weapons++
description:
Clear chambers, gain a new weapon, get more health, repeat.

Weapons++ is a roguelike where you add a new weapon to your arsenal after every chamber. 

7 different weapons and 4 enemy types. How fast can you beat the final boss?

Made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam Game Jam 98 with the theme "Empty" and restriction "Make it a Roguelike"

Programming, game design: krsss

Music, models, SFX: pikepaik123

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/pikepaik123/sets/weapons-soundtrack

GAME JAM

A lot of roguelike games have very general, passive items. Get 10% more health, move 8% faster, etc. So when the restriction was announced to be "Make it a Roguelike", a very general restriction, I wanted to make the concept interesting: no passive items. Everything is a new, interactive, responsive weapon you can use. Pair together different weapons and create builds to defeat the final boss.

(The theme was optional and we didn't have any good ideas for it. I guess "You have to empty the chambers")
